p: The content of phenolic compounds was assayed using the method described in detail by [ 23] using gallic acid as a standard. Twenty microliters of the sample was added to 20 µL of the diluted Folin–Ciocalteu reagent (with water 1:4, v/ v) followed by the addition of 160 µL of sodium carbonate (75 g/L). The absorbance was measured at λ = 680 nm after 20 min of incubation. The results were expressed as % of CPS.
